short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Use this chrome extension to stop diverting your mind elsewhere. You'll not able to access sites that divert your mind from work!!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Focus on Work!!

As the name suggests, this extension is developed to improve your productivity. Even if your mind get distracted, you will be notified that your work is more important right now.

“...Do you easily get distracted and waste your precious time on social sites?”

My simple extension wont let that happen.

-	Whenever you visit any social media sites or OTT platforms, this extension will not let you 
        open the site.
-	You will get a message that your work is more important right now.
-	You also get a new advice every time. 
-	Don't worry, you can visit those site after your work, simply disable the extension.

You are doing this for yourself. This extension simply just help you to stay on the track.
